List all managers with optional filters (Admin only)

schema.title: Response List Managers Api V1 Managers  Get

post.description: Add stadium access to a manager (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove stadium access from a manager (Admin only)

post.description:
Upload stadium images to Google Cloud Storage (Admin only)

Supports single or multiple file upload (max 10 files)
Send OTP to phone number (mock - always succeeds)

Verify OTP and return token
- Check if phone belongs to Manager -> return manager token
- Check if phone belongs to User -> return user token
- Else create new User -> return user token

get.description: Get current user profile

delete.description: Delete current user account (soft delete + anonymize)

put.description: Update registration status (e.g. mark as paid -> manager_assigned)

Get available hours for a stadium on a given date or day_of_week.
- booking_date: for one-time bookings (e.g. 2025-02-15)
- day_of_week: for recurring bookings (0=Mon, 6=Sun)
Returns: { timetable_hours: [], booked_hours: [], available_hours: [] }
List current user's bookings with stadium details.

schema.title: Response Get My Booking Api V1 Client Bookings  Booking Id  Get

put.description: Cancel one of my bookings (only if status is in_progress).
